thread.section_title: Blue Moon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great New York Stay
thread.title_full: Great New York Stay - Review of Blue Moon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: April A
title: Great New York Stay
text:
Had no issues with anything! The staff was very friendly! Great area to stay in. Plenty of restaurants and bars in walking distant. The Subways was a quick walk away. And the Front desk women even help us pick out the best bars for us!!
Room Tip: Go for the Suites with the balcony! Worth it! See more room tips
